txt.en: Delivered the carrots ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Lodging for a Day's Labour
Repaired the ladder ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Harvest wheat from the fields ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect the carrots for delivery ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Ho there, traveller! You look as if you are in need of a meal, and a place to put up your feet. You have a wholesome look about you.\n\n'You are welcome to take respite and break bread with us tonight, and in exchange we ask for a day's work on our farm. I am Gladion, and Limril my wife is a fine cook.'
Repaired a squeaky chair ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Pick cabbages ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Ah! Well done, friend. You have good arms and a strong back for this sort of work. Our village could use you, you know. It is a good life here in Lamedon.'

You politely tell Gladion that your life is one for travelling, not sitting still.

'A shame, [placeholder]. But that is well. You shall sit still tonight, at my wife's table! You will have a good rest this night.'
tbd channeling carrots
Gladion asks you to fix some creaky chairs and a broken ladder

'So you are interested in helping out? That is excellent. There are some squeaky chairs that Limril will not let back into the house until they are repaired, and also a ladder with a broken rung. I do not want anyone getting hurt.'
Gladion, a farmer of northern Lamedon, has offered you a night of lodging and hospitality in exchange for a day's labour on his farm.
You should harvest the wheat and cabbages, and carry the carrot-crate to the waggon bound for Calembel
Gladion is at his farm in northern Lamedon.\n\nYou should speak with Gladion about the help he needs on his farm.
Gladion is at his farm in northern Lamedon.\n\nYou should return to Gladion.

'That was fast! Thank you for the help, [placeholder]. Now, if you would be so good as to help with the harvest. The wheat and cabbages are ready for picking, and the carrots need to be brought to the waggon bound to Calembel.'
Gladion's farm is in northern Lamedon.\n\nYou should repair damaged furniture at Gladion's farm.
Gladion is at his farm in northern Lamedon.\n\nYou should speak with Gladion about the help he needs on his farm.
Tell Gladion you will help him with his work

The wheat and cabbages can be harvested from the fields at Gladion's farmstead. The crate of carrots is on Gladion's farm, and should be carried to the Calembel-bound waggon in the centre of the village.\n\nYou should harvest the crops and carry the carrots to the waggon.
Ask Gladion what else he needs
Dropped the carrots
Return to Gladion
